Sagittarius.Notes: Sagittarius, "The Archer", is one of the constellations of the zodiac. Its brightest star is Kaus Australis. M20 (Trifid Nebula) & Sagittarius Star Cloud
captions: Messier 54 was the first globular cluster found that is outside the Milky Way.
The Omega Nebula, also known as the Horseshoe or Swan Nebula
The "Teapot" asterism is in Sagittarius. The Milky Way is the "steam" coming from the spout.
The constellation Sagittarius. North is to the left. The line going to the right connects ζ to α and β Sagittarii. Above this line one sees Corona Australis.
Sagittarius region of the Milky Way
